Source code for anaplan_api.AnaplanRequest

from dataclasses import dataclass
from typing import Union



[docs]@dataclass()
class AnaplanRequest:
	_url: str
	_header: dict
	_body: Union[dict, str]


[docs]	def __init__(self, url: str, header: dict, body: Union[dict, str] = None):
		self._url = url
		self._header = header
		if body:
			self._body = body



[docs]	def get_url(self) -> str:
		return self._url



[docs]	def get_header(self) -> dict:
		return self._header



[docs]	def get_body(self) -> Union[dict, str]:
		if self._body:
			return self._body
		else:
			raise ValueError("Request body is empty")
